meanings.sent1: The knight's quixotry in always putting others before himself earned him the admiration of the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: Her quixotry in believing in true love and honor above all else made her a romantic at heart.

meanings.sent5: The quixotry of the young man who believed in fighting for justice against all odds was both noble and naive.
